simple.name: destination_uri
simple.description:
The path to the file to be written.
URI accepted prefixes: file:// Local Filesystem sca:// SCA Filesystem (path relative to SDRROOT/dom)

simple.name: destination_uri_suffix
simple.description: An optional prefix to be appended to the destination_uri.

simple.name: file_format
simple.description: The format of the data to be written to the file.

simple.name: swap_bytes
simple.description: When true, the endianness of the data will be switched from the local machine's representation. For example, on an x86 machine, the native endianness is little, so enabling this would cause big-endian data to be written. However on an ARM machine, the native endianness can be either little or big, and the interpretation of this property could change.

simple.name: recording_enabled
simple.description: When disabled, no data will be written to the specified file.

simple.name: debug_output
simple.description: This will enable additional debug output.

simple.name: force_flush
simple.description: When enabled, force a buffer (file) flush on every incoming packet.

simple.name: max_file_size
simple.description:
The maximum allowable size of the specified file.
Allowed Units: [None = Bytes] KB (1024 Bytes) MB (1024^2 Bytes) GB (1024^3 Bytes)

simple.name: max_file_time
simple.description:
The maximum allowable duration of data to store. This is calculated based on the sample rate of the incoming data, multiplied by the size of each sample.
-1 means unlimited.

simple.name: existing_file
simple.description: The behavior of the component in the case of the specified URI existing already.

simple.name: create_destination_dir
simple.description: When enabled, the destination directory specified by the URI will be created if it doesn't already exist, otherwise the data will be dropped.

simple.name: enable_metadata_file
simple.description: When enabled, the SRI data will be written to an XML file.

simple.name: reset_on_max_file
simple.description: When enabled, remove the file stream when the maximum file size has been reached.

simple.name: reset_on_retune
simple.description: When enabled, remove the file stream when the sample rate, mode, COL_RF, or CHAN_RF has been changed.

simple.name: use_hidden_files
simple.description: When enabled, prepend a '.' to the URI basename to hide the file during writing. This will be removed when the file is finished.

simple.name: open_file_extension
simple.description: An optional extension added to the URI basename of a file being written to presently.

simple.name: open_metadata_file_extension
simple.description: An optional extension added to the URI basename of a metadata file being written to presently.

structsequence.name: recording_timer
structsequence.description: Provides the ability to enable/disable recordings based on a timestamp. This provides only approximate snaps. It starts recording on the packet following the enabled timestamps and quits recording on the first packet following the disabled timestamp.

simple.name: recording_enable
simple.description: Control whether the timestamp dictates recording should begin or end.

simple.name: use_pkt_timestamp
simple.description: When enabled, use the timestamp receivied from the BULKIO packet. When disabled, use the timestamp reported by the system.

simple.name: twsec
simple.description: The whole second part of the timestamp.

simple.name: tfsec
simple.description: The fractional second part of the timestamp.

struct.description: The structure representing a file IO message.

simple.name: file_operation
simple.description: The message can indicate either an open or close event.

simple.name: stream_id
simple.description: The message can indicate a stream to be associated with the event.

simple.name: filename
simple.description: The message can indicate a filename to be associated with the event.

simple.name: domain_name
simple.description: Name of the domain in which this component exists. "(domainless)" is reported if no domain can be found.
